content: this pattern features a trio of solid colors stitched in a clever stripe pattern to create a mock ombre effect designed in red heart super saver this crochet blanket is worked in a single_crochet chain-1 stitch pattern with a playful fringe relax with the soothing tones featured or give your throw a vivid pop of color to wake up your space with well over 100 shades to stimulate your creativity super saver makes it easy to bring any vision to life
